title: Thermostat - Inspection

body.body: Inspect the thermostat at room temperature. If the thermostat is open, it must be replaced.
To check the thermostat is opening at the correct temperature, suspend the thermostat in a container of water and raise the temperature of the water until the thermostat opens.
Refer to the General Information section for the correct thermostat opening temperature.
If the temperature at which thermostat opening takes place is incorrect, replace the thermostat.
